text: Rebecca Ann Latimer Felton (10 June 1835 â€” 24 January 1930) was an American writer, lecturer and politician. She was in the United States Senate as a Democrat. She was from Georgia. Latimer Felton was born in the Atlanta area. She died in the city of Atlanta, aged 94. title: Rebecca Latimer Felton
